mapper.select: SELECT product_id, channel_id, cart_id, model_id, code, is_published, cn_group_id, publish_product_id, publish_product_status, main_product_flg, quantity_update_type, publish_status, num_iid, publish_datetime, publish_faild_comment, creater, created, modifier, modified FROM voyageone_ims.ims_bt_product WHERE channel_id = #{channel_id} AND cart_id = #{cart_id} AND code = #{code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO voyageone_ims.ims_bt_product ( channel_id, cart_id, code, num_iid, quantity_update_type, creater ) VALUES ( #{p.channel_id}, #{p.cart_id}, #{p.code}, #{p.num_iid}, #{p.quantity_update_type}, #{creater} )
mapper.select: select cart_id, order_channel_id channel_id, sku, date, CAST(sum(qty) AS signed) qty from ( select a.cart_id, a.parent_order_channel_id order_channel_id, b.sku, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(a.order_date_time, INTERVAL 8 HOUR), '%Y-%m-%d') AS date, b.quantity_ordered-b.quantity_returned qty from oms_bt_order_details b,oms_bt_orders a where a.order_number = b.order_number and b.adjustment=0 and b.`status` not in ('Canceled') and (a.order_date_time <= convert_tz(concat(date_format(date_add(CURDATE(), interval -1 day), '%Y-%m-%d'),' 23:59:59'), '+08:00', '+00:00') and convert_tz(concat(date_format(date_add(CURDATE(), interval -90 day), '%Y-%m-%d'),' 00:00:00'), '+08:00', '+00:00') <= a.order_date_time) ) sales group by cart_id, order_channel_id, sku, date limit #{oIdx},#{oLimit}
